creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: in foreground: gently rolling slopes with stream through center, trees, reeds, rocks; lake in background with sailboats, mountains
marks: L margin LRC: [ よし田 ] {Yoshida}; LRC, in pencil: Yoshida Hi
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Garden by Lake Biwa
